articles.title: Happy hypoxia meaning: Experts discuss coronavirus symptom and signs - Today.com
articles.description: Coronavirus patients may develop a symptom called silent hypoxia, where they have low oxygen levels but do not have shortness of breath.
articles.content: A well-known symptom of the coronavirus is low oxygen levels in the body, aka hypoxia, which normally lead to shortness of breath. But some coronavirus patients with hypoxia don't experience this hallmark sign that their oxygen levels have dropped into danger… [+5168 chars]
